quote: Is this French, I can't fucking read French.
title: The Outer Worlds

quote: If this is a joke, you should know I've never found anything funny in my life.
title: The Outer Worlds

quote: It's so much easier to see the world in black and white. Gray? I don't know what to do with gray...
title: Mass Effect 2

quote: You humans have a saying; an eye for an eye; a life for a life. Well he owes me ten lives and I plan to collect.
title: Mass Effect 2

quote: The day my father Odin banished me from Asgard, I was bitten by a vampire and had radioactive waste dumped into my eyes. To make matters worse, my mutant ability to control weather activated just as I was hit by a blast of gamma radiation.
title: Marvel Ultimate Alliance
